name: MLCActivationType
desc: An activation type that you specify for an activation descriptor.

items.name: case absolute
items.desc: An activation type that implements the absolute activation function.

items.name: case celu
items.desc: An activation type that implements the CELU activation function.

items.name: case clamp
items.desc: An activation type that implements the clamp activation function.

items.name: case elu
items.desc: An activation type that implements the exponential linear unit activation function.

items.name: case gelu
items.desc: An activation type that implements the gaussian error linear unit activation function.

items.name: case hardShrink
items.desc: An activation type that implements the hard shrink activation function.

items.name: case hardSigmoid
items.desc: An activation type that implements the hard sigmoid activation function.

items.name: case hardSwish
items.desc: An activation type that implements the hard swish activation function.

items.name: case linear
items.desc: An activation type that implements the linear activation function.

items.name: case logSigmoid
items.desc: An activation type that implements the log sigmoid activation function.

items.name: case none
items.desc: An activation type that implements the identity function.

items.name: case relu
items.desc: An activation type that implements the rectified linear unit activation function.

items.name: case relun
items.desc: An activation type that implements the ReLUN activation function.

items.name: case selu
items.desc: An activation type that implements the scaled exponential linear unit activation function.

items.name: case sigmoid
items.desc: An activation type that implements the sigmoid activation function.

items.name: case softPlus
items.desc: An activation type that implements the soft plus activation function.

items.name: case softShrink
items.desc: An activation type that implements the soft shrink activation function.

items.name: case softSign
items.desc: An activation type that implements the parametric soft sign activation function.

items.name: case tanh
items.desc: An activation type that implements the hyperbolic tangent activation function.

items.name: case tanhShrink
items.desc: An activation type that implements the hyperbolic tangent shrink activation function.

items.name: case threshold
items.desc: An activation type that implements the threshold activation function.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A textual description of the activation type, suitable for debugging.
